Text: I got a Go 710. Will it work?

i have a tomtom 700 with no memory card, only a hard drive. 

what should i do?

It works great...except for the text to speech. I got the mp3 and picture capability on my tomtom 700 but I cant get the text to speech to work. I've tried a lot of different voices (standard english) and it doesnt work.

The install was easy however, all I had to do was unzip the contents into the tomtom hard drive.
It works great on my 510 go text to speech mp3 and picture capability (all works great)

for the text to speech to work you need to download the voice i.e EnglishGb - Kate 283 MB
download here ( http://digital-forums.com/showthread.php?t=299048 )
worked brilliant on my tomtom 710.................thanks zibri

I'm stuck on 92.4%, plz seed.

Thnxs
